title_en: TNI-Polri Deploys Tens of Thousands of Personnel, State Fully Present to Restore Sumatra Post-Disaster
content:
Pemerintah memperkuat penanggulangan bencana di Sumatra dengan mengerahkan lebih dari 11.625 personel Polri di Aceh, Sumut, dan Sumbar, serta puluhan ribu personel TNI untuk SAR, distribusi logistik (2.428 ton oleh TNI dan 129,7 ton oleh Polri), pemasangan jembatan bailey, dan pembangunan hunian sementara.

Keterangan pers pada 19 Desember 2025 di Jakarta mengikuti arahan Presiden Prabowo Subianto, termasuk posko, transportasi udara/laut, dan relawan 7.269 orang. TNI fokus pada rekonstruksi seperti normalisasi jalan dan evakuasi medis.
content_en:
The government is strengthening disaster response in Sumatra by deploying over 11,625 Polri personnel across Aceh, North Sumatra, and West Sumatra, plus tens of thousands of TNI troops for SAR, logistics distribution (2,428 tons by TNI and 129.7 tons by Polri), Bailey bridge installation, and temporary housing construction.

The press briefing on December 19, 2025, in Jakarta followed President Prabowo Subianto's directives, including posts, air/sea transport, and 7,269 volunteers. TNI emphasizes reconstruction like road normalization and medical evacuations.
